8bf9b6e1-0165-42ed-af64-b62f401c9dca.name: 战斗反射
8bf9b6e1-0165-42ed-af64-b62f401c9dca.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

5c2df42f-06d9-41ff-9841-702da18391f1.name: 健康
5c2df42f-06d9-41ff-9841-702da18391f1.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

1a4afd7e-44e1-48aa-8ced-f05e241d0340.name: Fit, Very
1a4afd7e-44e1-48aa-8ced-f05e241d0340.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

8dc304f4-63cf-4b5b-822a-1356c093eb82.name: 幸运
8dc304f4-63cf-4b5b-822a-1356c093eb82.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

a0b30d8a-6785-4702-969c-c619e1b6b9a8.name: 易于命中
a0b30d8a-6785-4702-969c-c619e1b6b9a8.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

b596de97-c503-41e2-b8a2-aeed43e07bf8.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

4f4c62a3-a605-458f-bb8c-49eb3a0d4d5a.name: 标志性装备
4f4c62a3-a605-458f-bb8c-49eb3a0d4d5a.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

9483e48d-59ff-40c7-82c4-070465c7085d.name: Weapon Bond
9483e48d-59ff-40c7-82c4-070465c7085d.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

27b0f0a8-4cb4-4aa1-bfb3-4a73e084c7c9.name: 社会污名（少数群体）
27b0f0a8-4cb4-4aa1-bfb3-4a73e084c7c9.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group

0aebfc29-3513-4b96-ad5c-a66011275f99.name: 8 points spent on any previous skill, or on
